nodes.text: A boat, also known as a surface ship, or simply a ship, was a vehicle designed to navigate or "sail," on water. Ships equipped for naval warfare were referred to as warships. Examples of these types of vehicles were aircraft carriers, submarines, and waveskimmers. By analogy, crafts designed to "navigate" in interstellar space were referred to as starships.

Most Pamarthens of the ocean-dominated planet Pamarthe had to learn how to sail a boat before they were taught how to fly a starship. The crime lord known as Big String once used a boat to try and escape the bounty hunter Chanath Cha. On the Endor Moon, the Ewoks who lived in stilt villages built over lakes used small sailboats.
